Name: John Fredy
description:
John is a "warrior of many battles" who, despite adversities, never has given up on his dreams of improving the living conditions of his loved ones, and buying a house in the municipality of Ca√±asgordas. John, age 23, is single. He works growing coffee, an activity that was born of economic necessity and which he learned empirically.

He is requesting a loan to buy mulch and fertilizers. This will permit him to have better production from his crops. This investment will help him to have the capacity to meet customer demand.
